text: AMU Journal is an independent educational community and media organization based in Aligarh Muslim University founded in 2016 by Hashim Azmi to cover campus activities and raise campus issues. Later it became a media portal and educational community. AMU Journal relaunched its website on 17 October 2016 via Aligarh Muslim University Public relations officer, Proctor and Deputy in collaboration with University Training and placement office.https://www.news18.com/news/education-career/aligarh-muslim-university- student-start-online-portal-to-disseminate-amu-related-news-4367276.html ==Newsletter== In another important step, the AMU Journal launched a Monthly Newsletter in the historic Streachy Hall on the occasion of the 206th birth anniversary of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan on 17 October 2023.https://indianexpress.com/article/education/aligarh-muslim-university- journal-tpo-amu-launch-first-student-run-newsletter-8997152/ ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:English-language newspapers published in India
title: AMU Journal
